recipes.name: Creamy Broccoli Soup
recipes.description: A rich and creamy low-carb soup with tender broccoli and cheese.
instructions: Steam broccoli until fork-tender, about 5 minutes.
In a pot, melt butter over medium heat and sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add broccoli and broth. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Use an immersion blender (or transfer to a blender) to purée the soup.
Stir in heavy cream and cheddar cheese. Heat until cheese is melted.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Cheddar Jalapeño Keto Biscuits
recipes.description: Fluffy almond flour biscuits with sharp cheddar and spicy jalapeños.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment.
In a bowl, combine almond flour, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk eggs and sour cream.
Mix wet ingredients into dry. Fold in cheddar and jalapeños.
Scoop dough onto baking sheet to form biscuits.
Bake for 18–20 minutes, until golden brown.

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp Zoodles
recipes.description: Juicy shrimp tossed in garlic butter, served over zucchini noodles.
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
instructions: Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 3 minutes per side.
Remove shrimp and set aside.
In the same skillet, sauté zucchini noodles for 2–3 minutes until tender-crisp.
Return shrimp to skillet. Add lemon juice and toss to combine.
Season with salt, pepper, and parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Bacon-Wrapped Avocado Fries
recipes.description: Crispy, salty, and creamy bacon-wrapped avocado wedges.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment.
Cut each avocado into 4 wedges (8 total).
Sprinkle with smoked paprika.
Wrap each wedge with a slice of bacon and secure with a toothpick if needed.
Place on baking sheet and bake for 12–15 minutes, flipping halfway.
Serve warm with dipping sauce of choice.

recipes.name: Keto Chocolate Mousse
recipes.description: A quick and decadent low-carb chocolate mousse with just 4 ingredients.
instructions: In a bowl, combine cream, cocoa powder, sweetener, and vanilla.
Whip with a hand mixer until stiff peaks form.
Spoon into serving dishes and chill for 30 minutes.
Optional: top with shaved dark chocolate or whipped cream.

recipes.name: Keto Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy Alfredo chicken over low-carb zucchini noodles.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Cook chicken until golden and cooked through. Remove and set aside.
In the same skillet, sauté garlic for 1 minute.
Add heavy cream and Parmesan cheese. Stir until thickened.
Add zucchini noodles and toss until just tender.
Return chicken to the pan and coat with sauce.
Season with salt, pepper, and parsley.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Fried Rice
recipes.description: A low-carb, veggie-packed version of classic fried rice.
ingredients: 1 medium head cauliflower, grated into rice
2 tablespoons soy sauce or coconut aminos
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok.
Sauté onion, carrots, and peas until soft.
Push veggies to the side and scramble eggs in the pan.
Add cauliflower rice and soy sauce. Stir well.
Cook for 5–7 minutes until cauliflower is tender.
Garnish with sliced green onions.

recipes.name: Keto Egg Muffins
recipes.description: Portable, protein-packed breakfast muffins with eggs, cheese, and veggies.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Grease a 12-cup muffin tin.
Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Fold in spinach, bell pepper, cheese, and bacon.
Pour mixture into muffin cups, filling 3/4 full.
Bake for 18–20 minutes until set.
Let cool slightly before serving or storing.

recipes.name: Avocado Chicken Salad
recipes.description: Creamy chicken salad made with ripe avocado instead of mayo.
instructions: Mash avocado with lime juice in a bowl.
Stir in shredded chicken, celery, and onion.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve chilled on lettuce wraps or by itself.

recipes.name: Keto Buffalo Cauliflower Bites
recipes.description: Spicy, crispy cauliflower bites coated in buffalo sauce.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment.
Toss cauliflower with olive oil and garlic powder.
Roast for 20 minutes until golden.
Mix buffalo sauce with melted butter and toss roasted cauliflower in sauce.
Return to oven for 5 more minutes.
Serve with ranch or blue cheese dip.

recipes.name: Keto Meatballs with Zucchini Noodles
recipes.description: Tender meatballs served with marinara and zucchini noodles.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix ground beef, Parmesan, egg, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Form into 1-inch meatballs and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 18–20 minutes until cooked through.
Heat marinara sauce in a skillet and add baked meatballs.
Sauté zucchini noodles for 2–3 minutes until tender.
Serve meatballs over zoodles.
recipes.notes: Recipe 011 - Keto Meatballs with Zucchini Noodles

recipes.name: Keto Cheeseburger Casserole
recipes.description: A comforting low-carb cheeseburger casserole topped with melted cheese.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Brown ground beef with onion and garlic in a skillet.
Stir in tomato paste and cream cheese until melted.
Transfer to a baking dish and top with cheddar cheese.
Bake for 15–20 minutes until bubbly.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Keto Tuna Salad Lettuce Wraps
recipes.description: A refreshing tuna salad wrapped in crisp romaine or butter lettuce.
instructions: In a bowl, combine tuna, mayo, mustard, celery, and onion.
Season with salt and pepper.
Scoop tuna salad into lettuce leaves and roll or fold.
Serve immediately.
recipes.notes: Recipe 013 - Keto Tuna Salad Lettuce Wraps

recipes.name: Keto Chicken Enchilada Skillet
recipes.description: A one-pan keto chicken enchilada with all the flavor, none of the carbs.
instructions: Heat shredded chicken with enchilada sauce and green chilies in a skillet.
Stir in sour cream and half the cheese.
Top with remaining cheese and cover until melted.
Sprinkle with cilantro before serving.

recipes.name: Keto Coconut Macaroons
recipes.description: Chewy, sweet coconut macaroons made low-carb and sugar-free.
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment.
Whisk egg whites with salt until frothy.
Fold in coconut, erythritol, and vanilla.
Scoop into mounds and place on baking sheet.
Bake for 18–20 minutes until golden.
Cool before serving.

recipes.name: Keto Pepperoni Pizza Bites
recipes.description: Cheesy bite-sized pizza snacks packed with pepperoni.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a mini muffin pan.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl until well combined.
Scoop mixture into muffin cups.
Bake for 15–18 minutes until golden.
Cool slightly before serving with marinara dip.

recipes.name: Keto Garlic Butter Steak Bites
recipes.description: Tender steak bites seared in garlic butter, perfect with veggies.
ingredients: 1 pound sirloin steak, cut into 1-inch cubes
instructions: Season steak bites with salt and pepper.
Heat a skillet over high heat. Sear steak bites 2–3 minutes per side.
Lower heat and add butter and garlic.
Toss steak in garlic butter for 1 minute.
Garnish with parsley and serve.
recipes.notes: Recipe 017 - Keto Garlic Butter Steak Bites

recipes.name: Keto Cabbage Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and savory stir-fry made with cabbage and sesame oil.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon soy sauce or coconut aminos
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
Add cabbage and cook, stirring often, for 5–7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and red pepper flakes.
Cook until cabbage is tender. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Keto Deviled Eggs
recipes.description: Classic deviled eggs with mayo, mustard, and a dash of paprika.
instructions: Peel and halve the eggs. Remove yolks and mash in a bowl.
Mix yolks with mayo, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Spoon or pipe filling into egg whites.
Sprinkle with paprika before serving.

recipes.name: Keto Lemon Mug Cake
recipes.description: A quick lemony mug cake made in the microwave — tangy and fluffy.
instructions: In a mug, mix all ingredients until smooth.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds.
Cool slightly before eating. Top with whipped cream if desired.

recipes.name: Keto Egg Roll in a Bowl
recipes.description: All the flavor of an egg roll, none of the wrapper — fast and low-carb.
instructions: Brown ground pork in sesame oil in a skillet.
Add garlic, ginger, cabbage, and carrots.
Stir-fry for 5–7 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Stir in soy sauce and green onions.
Serve warm.
recipes.notes: Recipe 021 - Keto Egg Roll in a Bowl

recipes.name: Keto Cauliflower Mac and Cheese
recipes.description: A creamy, cheesy, low-carb alternative to traditional mac and cheese.
ingredients: 1 medium head cauliflower, cut into florets
instructions: Steam cauliflower until fork-tender, about 8 minutes.
In a saucepan, melt butter and add cream. Bring to a simmer.
Stir in cheddar cheese until melted.
Add steamed cauliflower and toss to coat.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
recipes.notes: Recipe 022 - Keto Cauliflower Mac and Cheese

recipes.name: Keto Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy almond flour pancakes perfect for a low-carb breakfast.
instructions: Whisk all ingredients in a bowl until smooth.
Heat butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Pour 2–3 tablespoons batter per pancake.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.
Serve with keto syrup or berries.

recipes.name: Keto Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers filled with seasoned ground beef and melted cheese.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Brown beef with onion in a skillet. Drain excess fat.
Stir in tomato sauce, seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Stuff pepper halves with beef mixture.
Top with mozzarella and bake for 25 minutes.
Serve warm.

recipes.name: Keto Chocolate Fat Bombs
recipes.description: Rich, satisfying chocolate fat bombs for quick keto energy.
instructions: Melt all ingredients together in a saucepan over low heat.
Stir until smooth and well combined.
Pour into silicone molds or mini muffin liners.
Freeze for 30–60 minutes until solid.
Store in fridge or freezer.
